name: Animal Link - Onet connect animal
description:
Great puzzle game to entertain in free time!

This version is optimized with cool graphics and effects and makes you crazy all the time.

Main Features:
+ Userfriendly portrait view
+ New interface with better animation
+ Bigger cards with better quality design
+ Fruit & Animal theme
+ 100 levels, with many kinds of gameplay from increase different pairs and movable cards...
+ Time Attack and Hints

HOW TO PLAY?
+ The main objective of this game is to remove all icon tiles.
+ Tap the icon tiles to select it.
+ You have to find two identical icon tiles that can be connected with up to 3 straight lines where there is no other tiles blocking on the connecting line path.

Let’s play and challenge your friends and family!
publishers: CAT VIET SOFTWARE DEVELOPMENT & MEDIA JSC
